adDetails: I am offering my services as a Caregiver. I have many years of experience as a caregiver. I will do most and any hours Monday thru Friday including sleepovers. My rate starts at 15.00 per hour depending on the time needed. I will come to a fair agreement for the individual depending on the level of care needed.I do errands, cleaning, personal care, meal prep, dr.appt., companionship, pet care, and many other things needed.
